TopicTitle: Reverting flight doesn't revert the flight

Articles.Content:
PS4. When I revert the flight back to VAB, I return to the VAB but the ship and crew don't. Lost Jeb, Val and Bill because I didn't realize before it was too late. Restarted game and console but problem continues. Sad...just sad.

 

I have found that reverting back to launchpad and recovering the vehicle works.

Edited January 23, 2018 by SleepyInsomniac
Workaround

As far as I know (from my experience), you did not loose them. But when revertin to VAB, many times the vehicle remains on the launch pad. So the pilots are not available for you. But if you try to start another rocket you will get a message that there is different rocket on the launch pad and if you want to recover and clear it. This gives you your parts (=money) and crew back. Basically after you revert you still have to recover. So this bug is not gamebreaking, just annoying.
